posts.subject: Hentai manga/anime sites
posts.body:
Links to hentai related content on ZeroNet, but also elsewhere. Feel free to suggest additional links or removal of dead ones.

==ZeroNet==

'''General'''
- [LoliGuide](/1LoLis8K1kohYduZuwsFc1wt3PFsbZMMUn/): Links to all things loli
- [Millchan Classic /loli/](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1MXvnQ44YQj7vYNDCs6DjuW1D2ZBkTBoZW:l:0)
- [Sadpanda metadata](/19dfPUtRhw6KxzAYBzfntburwuZDQULMZ3): Contains a searchable database of the whole of Sadpanda before it went down

'''Manga'''
- [Alotaplot](/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ): Mostly tankoubon and serialized works
- [PomfPomfMoe](/1PomfMoeTPxQ5gLJBeD1sBvaizxbHxf8Zv): Everything tagged loli on pomfpomfmoe before it went down
- [LoliGod's Gallery](/1Dy2bs4GygFrBPxvZAvysuYQG7P8g3qSYj)
- [NekoNekoNyan](/1MxhTsxNSTu2nzevPHi7QRT8kP4B5BB5LW): Catgirls doing naughty stuff
- [Nekololi's Gallery](/1Nekos4fiBqfcazyG1bAxdBT5oBvA76Zmo): Loli catgirls doing naughty stuff
- [Lolirape](/12wD9eHFshoJ5dVjjcKCTELd5zsfqAB6ms)

'''3D Comics'''
- [3D Porno Gallery Hub](/16cYTZiW45hZ1tQCVVth5ZVqNe2ZZAWUFk)
- [3D Gay Porno Hub](/1Gay3DR1K69PoqMukjShz9sPiWqUSLtVxt)
- [3D Lolicon Porno Hub](/1LoLimgqzXFyHn8bBrTuo3EDsczXQCpYRY)

==Clearnet==

'''Manga'''
[nHentai](https://nhentai.net) (dl req login, torrents + web seed)
[Pururin](https://pururin.io) (dl req login)
[Sukebei Nyaa](https://sukebei.nyaa.si) (torrents)
[Hentai2Read](https://hentai2read.com)
[MangaDex](https://mangadex.org) (no downloads)
[E-Hentai](https://e-hentai.org/)
[Hitomi](https://hitomi.la/) (bad ui)
[HentaiRules](https://www.hentairules.net/) (no lolicon)
[Hentai Lolicon](https://hentailolico.com/)
[Hentai Knight](http://www.hentaiknight.com)

'''Anime'''
[HentaiTake](https://hentaitake.net)
[Sukebei Nyaa](https://sukebei.nyaa.si) (torrents)

'''Games'''
[Sukebei Nyaa](https://sukebei.nyaa.si) (torrents)

'''Other'''
[Luscious](https://luscious.net) (mixed)
[Nyaa](https://nyaa.si) (mixed, torrents)

==I2P==
You can find some i2p sites on the LoliGuide zite.

==R.I.P.==

~~Patoto~~
~~PomfPomfMoe~~
~~HentaiHaven~~ (anime)
~~[Exhentai](https://exhentai.org/)~~ (everything)
~~AllTheFallen~~ (loli)

>>c2a83c86-3184-42a2-9bdf-9ac55480ec3e
Nice zite, added.

**Hentaihaven shut down dec last year. They'll be partnering with FAKKU in the future, I'm surprised you hadn't heard about it. Even little Timmy knows.**

That's worrying. But I'm not surprised. The UN is full of moral busybodies who get paid to sit on a chair and build paper dragons to fight.
To get an idea the caliber of geniuses that work there, look into their plan to capture warlord Kony using Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt as bait.

posts.subject: Cum Page thread
posts.body:
Post the last hentai page that made you cum.

To get this thread going I'll post two that made me cum today.
This time it's one, but over two pages. I have no idea how many time's I've cum to this story from COMIC Koh Vol.2, it's just so sexy.
